topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Version Control :: CVS

name: Script-Friendly CVS wrapper
short_description: A tool for more easily interfacing to CVS from UNIX shell scripts.  Built on an included Python module for more easily interfacing to CVS from Python programs.  Also includes other CVS Utilities.
